title: Periodic lag spikes
body:
Just had to upgrade to a new modem, got a Netgear modem/router combo and installed it. Have been having weird lag spikes ever since. I can chat during them, I can talk to my friend on Curse during them but for 20-50 seconds straight I just see minions swing at each other, I see people move around and HP levels change but no animations or actions until the spike subsides after 20-50 seconds. Obviously I can't play ranked until this crap is fixed.

I've already done the DNS and port forwarding suggestions in the LOL support page. Can anyone help, please?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're getting packet loss or some kind of connection issue.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to be sure.  

If my suspicions are correct, then you'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Since you got a new network device, it's likely that some re-configuring might be needed.  I hope that helps!
